name: Frontline Grunt
description:
A First-Person Shooter game in which the main goal is to capture and secure objectives in a level and winning by draining other team's conquest points.
As a "Grunt" you have a selection of four classes to pick from and a 5th unlocks if your good at gaining score points with a selection of vehicles at your disposal to hit the frontline and achieve victory on various landscapes featuring all four weather seasons.
